title: Synthesis and application of sustainable vegetable oil-based polymers in 3D printing
content:
RSC Sustain., 2024, 2,1708-1737
DOI: 10.1039/D4SU00060A, Tutorial Review
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Rahul Saraswat, Shagun, Abhimanew Dhir, A. S. S. Balan, Satvasheel Powar, Mrityunjay Doddamani
Chemical modifications of vegetable oil and their 3D printing applications are discussed. Acrylate resin compatibility with 3D printing methods are presented. 3D printed products using vegetable oil-derived materials, providing insights into future opportunities are explored.
